Messages.IDS_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Where would you like the shortcuts to be installed?
Messages.IDS_CTRL_STATICTEXT_TOPINSTRUCTIONS: The shortcut icons will be created in the folder indicated below. If you don't want to use the default folder, you can either type a new name, or select an existing folder from the list.
Messages.IDS_CTRL_RADIOBTN_PERUSER: Install shortcuts for current user only
Messages.IDS_CTRL_RADIOBTN_ALLUSERS: Make shortcuts available to all users
